video_identification.title: Part of speech to the Global Anti-Apartheid Conference held in Johannesburg, South Africa, May 2024

extracted_metadata.title: Part of speech to the Global Anti-Apartheid Conference held in Johannesburg, South Africa, May 2024
extracted_metadata.description: The following edited audio was prepared by Salman Abu Sitta as a speech to present to the Global Anti-Apartheid Conference on Palestine held in Johannesburg, South Africa on May 10-12, 2024. Credits to: "If Americans Knew", an independent research NGO with a focus on the Israeli-Palestinian issue.
